Buy Green Act of 2024
To support and fund the Federal procurement of clean energy products, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Oversight and Accountability, and Transportation and Infrastructure, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
